amendment.description: Amendment to exempt the State of Nebraska from the ISTEA 1991 truck length freeze, subject to a change in state statute, to allow the operation of commercial vehicle combinations not exceeding 81 feet, six inches for custom harvesters operating in the State of Nebraska.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered six printed in Part B of House Report 109-14 to exempt the State of Nebraska from the ISTEA 1991 truck length freeze, subject to change in states statute, to allow the operation of commercial vehicle combinations not exceeding 81 feet, 6 inches for custom harvesters operating in the State of Nebraska.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Osborne amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 184 (Roll no. 58).
